info:identity.info:name: com.ibm.streamsx.objectstorage
info:identity.info:description: The **com.ibm.streamsx.objectstorage** toolkit supports access to the Object Storage. This toolkit provides Operators and Functions for the following tasks: * Create/Delete bucket (S3)/container (Swift) (Functions) * Put/Get object (ObjectSink/ObjectSource operators) * Delete object (Functions) * List objects (Functions)
